name: Blocked (Fioryn)
description:
One sprite challenge, puzzle/arcade game

INSTRUCTIONS: Arrow keys to move, cover as many squares as possible. If you leave a colored zone, it'll disappear! Sometimes two zones the same colour spawn next to each other, soooo good luck with that. A single zone cannot span over two "lines". Score is squares covered divided by time

All code and art by me, sfx from scratch
